title: Gnome Cunning
content:
Gnome Cunning Effect You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws. Requirements Gnome Deep Gnome Forest Gnome Rock Gnome

Gnome Cunning is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Traits provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
